actions.name: AddTags
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a trail, up to a limit of 10

actions.name: CancelQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a running query

actions.name: CreateEventDataStore
actions.description: Grants permission to create an event data store

actions.name: CreateTrail
actions.description: Grants permission to create a trail that specifies the settings for delivery of log data to an Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: DeleteEventDataStore
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an event data store

actions.name: DeleteTrail
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a trail

actions.name: DescribeQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to list details for the query

actions.name: DescribeTrails
actions.description: Grants permission to list settings for the trails associated with the current region for your account

actions.name: GetEventDataStore
actions.description: Grants permission to list settings for the event data store

actions.name: GetEventSelectors
actions.description: Grants permission to list settings for event selectors configured for a trail

actions.name: GetInsightSelectors
actions.description: Grants permission to list CloudTrail Insights selectors that are configured for a trail

actions.name: GetQueryResults
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch results of a complete query

actions.name: GetTrail
actions.description: Grants permission to list settings for the trail

actions.name: GetTrailStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a JSON-formatted list of information about the specified trail

actions.name: ListEventDataStores
actions.description: Grants permission to list event data stores associated with the current region for your account

actions.name: ListPublicKeys
actions.description: Grants permission to list the public keys whose private keys were used to sign trail digest files within a specified time range

actions.name: ListQueries
actions.description: Grants permission to list queries associated with an event data store

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for trails or event data stores in the current region

actions.name: ListTrails
actions.description: Grants permission to list trails associated with the current region for your account

actions.name: LookupEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to look up API activity events captured by CloudTrail that create, update, or delete resources in your account

actions.name: PutEventSelectors
actions.description: Grants permission to create and update event selectors for a trail

actions.name: PutInsightSelectors
actions.description: Grants permission to create and update CloudTrail Insights selectors for a trail

actions.name: RemoveTags
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a trail

actions.name: RestoreEventDataStore
actions.description: Grants permission to restore an event data store

actions.name: StartLogging
actions.description: Grants permission to start the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for a trail

actions.name: StartQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to start a new query on a specified event data store

actions.name: StopLogging
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for a trail

actions.name: UpdateEventDataStore
actions.description: Grants permission to update an event data store

actions.name: UpdateTrail
actions.description: Grants permission to update the settings that specify delivery of log files
